item.title: Non-Linear Programming on Multiple Data Sets
item.description: Author: Ed Orlando Introduction & Problem Statement We have all been there. We are at the end of a semester in school and the only thing left to do is take that dreaded final exam. If you were like me, you wanted to know what minimum score you needed on the final exam to get a certain overall grade. In this article, we will solve this very straightforward optimization problem programmatically using Râ€™s ROI package.
